title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of households in millions, with a total of 5 data points.
Overall Number of households in millions has increased over the Year
Number of households in millions is gradually constant from 2005 to 2017.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2015.
Max Number of households in millions about 34.07 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Number of households in millions about 24.8 was recorded at Year 2005
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of households in millions with a total of 5 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is increasing which exists from 2017 to 2005.
